tree.caption: A young man with short, dark hair, wearing a black t-shirt, smiles at the camera as a woman's voice can be heard off-screen . Two girls, one in a black jacket and the other in a white shirt, stand close together in a brightly lit room,
tree.summary: A group of young friends, including two women and two men, gather in a brightly lit room, smiling and chatting as they prepare to record a video. They exchange playful banter, asking each other if they're ready to go, record, and have fun, before one of them holds up a phone to capture the moment. A young woman with long, dark hair is shown smiling at the camera, with a man's voice heard in the background, while a woman's voice off-screen asks if she's ready to go home. Two young girls, one in a black jacket and the other in a white jacket, are also shown smiling and chatting in a brightly lit room.
